title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for
heading: 3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion 

after the definition of “duly accredited person” of the following definition: 

“ ‘EU Regulation’ means Regulation (EC) No 1071/2009 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 21 October 20092 as amended 
by Commission Regulation (EU) No 613/2012 of 9 July 20123, Council 
Regulation (EU) No 517/2013 of 13 May 20134 and Regulation (EU) 
2020/1055 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 15 July 
20201;”.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for
heading: 5. Schedules 1 and 2 to the Principal Regulations are amended by the
text_raw:
5. Schedules 1 and 2 to the Principal Regulations are amended by the 
insertion under “Transport Manager Details” of the following additional 
details: 

“NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES 

Number of Employees on 31 December of the previous year”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 

27 April, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [210]

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), and for
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Transport (Operator's Licence Application) 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 398 of 2018) to require a road transport operator to 
provide to the Minister for Transport the number employees employed by the 
operator on 31 December of the previous year. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [210] 5
